content.value:
Your pom.xml might list just 7 dependencies, but your application might be dependent on many more.

One of my favorite @intellijidea features is being able to view ALL the dependencies in my @ASFMavenProject project, in a visual manner (including its transitive dependencies).
content.html: Your pom.xml might list just 7 dependencies, but your application might be dependent on many more. One of my favorite @intellijidea features is being able to view ALL the dependencies in my @ASFMavenProject project, in a visual manner (including its transitive dependencies).
